english_example_sentence: If she did not know the traditional Turkish recipe, she would not cook the delicious meal
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не знала традиционный турецкий рецепт, она бы не готовила вкусное блюдо
turkish_example_sentence: O geleneksel Türk tarifini bilmese, lezzetli yemeği pişirmeyecekti
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O geleneksel Türk tarifini ______, lezzetli yemeği pişirmeyecekti
